description: Try our easy to follow Flatbreads recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Flatbread,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Flatbreads Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp coriander leaves (to taste, for flavoring)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yeast with 1/3 cup warm water and 1 tbs of oil. Set aside for 5 minutes until frothy (if there is no froth, the yeast is not active).
Combine flour and salt in a large bowl and make a well in the centre. Add yeast mixture, 1 cup warm water and 1 tbs of oil. Stir until well combined.

Turn out dough onto a floured surface and knead well for 5 minutes until smooth. Grease a large bowl with a little extra oil, add dough and turn to coat in oil. Cover with plastic wrap and set aside in a warm place for 30 minutes or until doubled in size.

Turn out dough and knead until smooth. Divide into 6 equal portions. Knead in your choice of flavours. Roll out until 1cm thick. Brush both sides of the dough with extra oil and cook on a preheated barbecue or chargrill pan for 23 minutes each side or until cooked through and golden.
